front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Capacitance Current Switching for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Above 1000 V Amendment Changing the Capacitive Inrush/Outrush Limitations of Switchgear
front.abstract: Covered in this amendment are changes in di/dt limitations for non-oil circuit breakers. A section has been added describing possible delayed current zeros when doing a rapid closeâ€”open of a line circuit breaker (CO) when shunt reactors are connected to a line or cable.
